text: The 1977–78 New York Rangers season was the 52nd season of the New York Rangers franchise. The Rangers slipped to last in the Patrick but qualified for the playoffs by having one of the top twelve records in the league. The Rangers lost in the first round of the playoffs. ==Offseason== The Rangers hired Jean-Guy Talbot as their new head coach. It would be his only season as head coach of the Rangers. ==Regular season== ===Season standings=== ==Schedule and results== {| class="toccolours" width=90% style="clear:both; margin:1.5em auto; text-align:center;" |- !
